title: FS: T206 – PSA & SGC graded including HOF’ers and a Cycle 350 - ALL SOLD
author: willworkforT206

posts.post_title: FS: T206 – PSA & SGC graded including HOF’ers and a Cycle 350 - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling some more of my T206 doubles.  I have the following available:

Mordecai Brown (HOF) (Cubs on shirt), Sweet Caporal 150/30, SGC 50/4, more difficult 150 series variation, $215  SOLD
Birdie Cree, Sweet Caporal 350/30, SGC 70/5.5, slight diamond cut, $115  SOLD
Bobby Wallace (HOF), Piedmont 150, PSA 4/VG-EX nice color, $115  SOLD
Davy Jones, Cycle 350, PSA 3/VG, corner crease, $75 SOLD

Prices include shipping. Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option).

E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts. Please e-mail me at [URL="sschris@att.net"]sschris@att.net[/URL] if interested. 

Regular Paypal (not “gift”) is my preferred method of payment, but other arrangements can be made.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE. I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME. I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS. THANKS.

Thanks for looking.

Steve
